content:
I need your help to write an article on each of the following topics:
Main Topic: Choosing the Right Builder: Tips for Homeowners in NSW
Silo Topic 1: Researching local builders in NSW
Silo Topic 2: Questions to ask potential builders during the interview process
Silo Topic 3: Red flags to watch out for when choosing a builder in NSW

If you understand, limit your reply by saying the word: "acknowledged".
